ground_truth.thought: 分析互联网金融对传统银行业的冲击
ground_truth.name: FinancialAnalysis.analyze_impact

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FinancialAnalysis.analyze_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of internet finance on traditional banking sectors', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Data related to traditional banking and internet finance'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis of the impact'}]}, {'name': 'BankingData.get_bank_data', 'description': 'Retrieve historical data of traditional banking operations', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'years', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Years for which data is required'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'Historical banking data'}]}, {'name': 'InternetFinance.get_transformation_strategies', 'description': 'Find out the transformation strategies of traditional banks in response to internet finance', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'strategies', 'description': 'Transformation strategies'}]}, {'name': 'FinanceProduct.compare_advantages', 'description': 'Compare the competitive advantages of internet finance products and traditional banking products', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'comparison', 'description': 'Comparison of product advantages'}]}, {'name': 'PolicyResearch.get_support_measures', 'description': 'Research policy measures supporting traditional banks in dealing with internet finance', 'required_parameters': [], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'measures', 'description': 'Policy support measures'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名金融分析师，对互联网金融对传统银行业的冲击很感兴趣。首先，我需要获取传统银行业近几年的业务数据。然后，我想了解互联网金融兴起后传统银行的转型策略。接着，我需要分析互联网金融产品与传统银行产品的竞争优势。最后，我想要研究相关政策对传统银行应对互联网金融冲击的支持措施。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取传统银行业近几年的业务数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
BankingData.get_bank_data
当前工具的参数'years'的值是什么?
{'data': 'Historical banking data from 2018 to 2023'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'data': 'Historical banking data from 2018 to 2023'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
查询互联网金融兴起后传统银行的转型策略
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
InternetFinance.get_transformation_strategies
{'strategies': 'Transformation strategies of traditional banks in response to internet finance'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'strategies': 'Transformation strategies of traditional banks in response to internet finance'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析互联网金融产品与传统银行产品的竞争优势
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
FinanceProduct.compare_advantages
{'comparison': 'Comparison of competitive advantages between internet finance products and traditional banking products'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'comparison': 'Comparison of competitive advantages between internet finance products and traditional banking products'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
研究相关政策对传统银行应对互联网金融冲击的支持措施
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolicyResearch.get_support_measures
{'measures': 'Policy measures supporting traditional banks in dealing with internet finance'}
